body_html:
@cwhipkey

  1. So it is necessary to align with topk.
  2. SAMPLE means we choose some elements from the ties for guarantee exactly k classes. the result k classes may contain the object or not.

Actually, there is not a perfect way to deal with the tie situation. you could have a look at the issue.

@cwhipkey

So it is necessary to align with topk.
SAMPLE means we choose some elements from the ties for guarantee exactly k classes. the result k classes may contain the object or not.

Actually, there is not a perfect way to deal with the tie situation. you could have a look at the issue.
body:
@cwhipkey 
1. So it is necessary to align with topk. 
2. SAMPLE means we choose some elements from the ties for guarantee exactly k classes. the result k classes may contain the object or not.

Actually, there is not a perfect way to deal with the tie situation. you could have a look at the [issue](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/10767).
